title: STOP DON'T PLAY RANKED PLACEMENTS!!
body:
You see based on science and mathematics, you'll have a better chance of winning your placements if you wait for a while.  Let's say you're a Gold player and your MMR is reset to mid Silver for placements.  If you play right away, you'll be playing against other Gold players with that same MMR.  BUT if you wait for a while, the higher level players will have moved out and you'll be left with lower level Silver players and you'll own them.

Science

*I'm not saying that you will lose all your placement matches if you play now.  I'm just saying that you'll have a better chance of winning if you wait.*
